name: minted-directory
title: Minted Directory
desc: Theme for creating static directory websites fast that are SEO optimized. Use markdown and front-matter data for listings.
article:
What Is This Theme For:

This template makes it easy and free to start a directory website with good SEO.

What Is A Directory Website:

A directory website curates a list of links or resources related to a specific niche. The purpose is to help visitors easily find businesses, products, locations, or other relevant content.

Popular ways to monetize directory websites include:

  • Selling promoted spots.
  • Using affiliate links.
  • Displaying ads.

Success in these strategies requires attracting a significant amount of visitors, depending on your niche. Effective marketing through SEO and organic social media content is essential.

Features Included:

The theme includes the features:

  • Add Listings with markdown.
  • SEO optimizations and pSEO out of the box
  • Pre-built components for directories.
  • Customizable style.
  • Dark/Light mode
  • Sponsored Content
  • Emoji favicon
